name: White Ice Shamballa Bracelet Swarovski Stones 4.50ct
description:
Main Features
ITEM: White Ice Shamballa Bracelet Swarovski Stones 4.50ct #K182
10mm genuine Swarovski stones ball beads & 7mm hematite ball beads
Each 10mm ball bead is hand set with 0.50ctw genuine Swarovski Stones totaling 4.50ctw
Bracelet is adjustable to 9 inches
Can be worn by men or women
Crafted in Italy by designer Richard & Co.
WEIGHT: 26.70 Grams
Brand New - Comes in a gift box.
Our Price:    $55.00 + shipping

Express shipping 	
	USPS Priority Mail 	
	USPS Priority Mail (2-3 day) *	$4.75

         USPS Express 2nd day *	$19.95		

	 FedEx Next day *	$29.95		

	
This hand made Shamballa bracelet is crafted out of black Italian macramé string, genuine Swarovski stones, and genuine Hemetite. Hematite is a healing stone used for many centuries and has shown to improve health. Hematite was also used to improve lust in relationships. Shamballa bracelets symbolize vitality, love, inner strength, power, mind, and balance. Shamballa Bracelets have hit the wrists of some of the worlds most famous artists. We're proud to offer you our 100%
